title: Trump Policies Are Putting Clean Energy Jobs at Risk
summary: The Trump administration’s energy policies are jeopardizing the creation of new jobs in the wind, solar, and other alternative energy sectors, a report by a transition outlet has warned. According to E2, jobs in energy transition industries grew much faster than jobs in the conventional energy sect…
